plot: Cyclops focuses the X-Men on finding Bolivar Trask. However, when the team locates the Sentinel inventor, they realize that they all have been played by a mastermind.

Rogue goes looking for the man she believes is responsible for Gambit's death, while the other man fly to Genosha to help in rescue attempts after the Sentinel attack. Roberto takes Jubiilee home to meet his mother and break the news about the fact he's a mutant,.—Gislef
